channel.title: A question! Fast answer please!
channel.description:
Question 1: If i enter a shop name with the items in Shops.CFG, what do i need to do to see the buying screen. Question 2: How do i spawn NPC'S? Question 3: At NPCDrops.cfg, it says like: //man 995 (i belive thats money) then 30 then 15. Why 30 and 15? Does that mean something it drops 30 coins, and sometimes 15? Question 4: Where can i put commands? Question 5: When i spawn an npc by doing this: ::npc 1, i don't do any damge, he doesn't do any damage. Why? Or is that the wrong way of spawning?
BTW: It's in a 317 server.

item.title: A question! Fast answer please!
item.dc:creator: @xweetok599 xweetok599
item.description:
@xweetok599 wrote:

Worked, ty, but i hit 0, he hits 0, if i opened my server up for 1 hour, we keeped hitting 0. How do i change that? And how do i change weapon damage and animations?

Read full topic

item.title: A question! Fast answer please!
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

Thats an easy one.
You have been using spaces between the coordinats, you need to use a TAB.
Use this code:

spawn = 2	3212	3422	0	0	0	0	0	1	man

Read full topic

item.title: A question! Fast answer please!
item.dc:creator: @xweetok599 xweetok599
item.description:
@xweetok599 wrote:

DeltaClean
Started Server
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: “2
3212 3422 0 0 0 0 0 1
Man”
at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException.
java:48)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:458)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:499)
at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1856)
at NPCHandler.(NPCHandler.java:55)
at Server.main(Server.java:108)
[Client-1-Xweetok59]: Character Loaded Sucessfully [Has powers, lag: 11 ms]
[Client-2-Xweetok59]: Character Loaded Sucessfully [Has powers, lag: 9 ms]
And then Error. Can’t login.
But if i deleted the things in the autospawn.cfg everything works fine! What code did i wrong?

item.title: A question! Fast answer please!
item.dc:creator: @xweetok599 xweetok599
item.description:
@xweetok599 wrote:

[quote=“SirPali, post:2, topic:329067”]1: Search for WanneShop in client.java
You should see something like this:

if(NPCID == npcidhere){ // The npcID is the NPC that you want to be the shopkeeper PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 1; // This is the shop ID you're trying to open }
2. Autospawn.cfg

  1. The 995 is indeed the itemcode of the drop, in this case coins, 30 is the amount, and 15 is the dropchance in percentages.
    In this case it would mean that the NPC drops 30 coins, 15% of the time.

  2. Open up client.java and search for

[code]private void customCommand(String command) {[/client]
There you will find other commands already added, use them as an example for your commands.

Good luck![/code][/quote]
// NPCID Xcoord Y coord Height Xcorner1 Ycorner1 Xcorner2 Ycorner2 Walktype Description
spawn = 2 3212 3422 0 0 0 0 0 1 Man
This is what i got, but i don’t see any n[c

Read full topic

item.title: A question! Fast answer please!
item.dc:creator: @bamse9400 bamse9400
item.description:
@bamse9400 wrote:

This is copied from my autospawn:
spawn = 409 2591 3157 0 0 0 0 0 1
so what you gotta do is to replace 409 that is the npc id. Replace that with the npc id that runs the shop. Then log in to your game as an admin and go to the place you want your shop to be then type “::mypos” then you should get 8 numbers take the first 4 and paste over 2591 then take the last 4 and paste over 3157 now you should have a working npc.

Question 3: At NPCDrops.cfg, it says like: //man
995 (i belive thats money) then 30 then 15. Why 30 and 15? Does that mean something it drops 30 coins, : This should meen that theres 15% chance for the monster to drop 30 coins.

Read full topic

item.title: A question! Fast answer please!
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

If you can’t find Wanneshop, then search for

case 17:

Case 17: handles the 2nd click options (like Trade) on npc’s.

As for autospawn, sure, here is a bit from my Autospawn

// NPCID    Xcoord    Y coord   Height     Xcorner1      Ycorner1   Xcorner2   Ycorner2   Walktype   Description
spawn = 605	3209	3432	0	3210	3436	3206	3426	1	Sir Vyvin (quest)
spawn = 551	3216	3416	0	3218	3418	3214	3414	1	Varrock shop keeper
spawn = 550	3232	3424	0	3234	3426	3230	3423	1	Varrock ranged shop
spawn = 553	3253	3401	0	3254	3402	3252	3400	1	Aubury (runes)
spawn = 708	3240	3460	0	3246	3469	3235	3456	1	Imp Varrock
spawn = 2	3217	3424	0	3219	3426	3215	3422	1	Man

You use the Xcorner etc in to set the area in which the NPC can walk (walktype 1 = NPC moves around, 0 = NPC stands still)

Try adding

if(NPCID == 551){ // The npcID is the NPC that you want to be the shopkeeper 
                               PutNPCCoords = true;               
                 WanneShop = 1; // This is the shop ID you're trying to open              
          }

In the case 17 I mentioned. Just to test if it works:)

Read full topic

item.title: A question! Fast answer please!
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

1: Search for WanneShop in client.java
You should see something like this:

if(NPCID == npcidhere){ // The npcID is the NPC that you want to be the shopkeeper PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 1; // This is the shop ID you're trying to open }
2. Autospawn.cfg

  1. The 995 is indeed the itemcode of the drop, in this case coins, 30 is the amount, and 15 is the dropchance in percentages.
    In this case it would mean that the NPC drops 30 coins, 15% of the time.

  2. Open up client.java and search for

[code]private void customCommand(String command) {[/client]
There you will find other commands already added, use them as an example for your commands.

Good luck![/code]

Read full topic
